titleStmt.title: [Entries from the Cherokee Supreme Court Docket, 1823-1834, New Echota] 1825 Oct. 17: a machine readable transcription of an image

publicationStmt.publisher: University of Tennessee Special Collections Library

availability.p: This work is the property of the Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, TN. It may be used freely by individuals for research, teaching, and personal use as long as this statement of availability is included in the text. For all other use contact the Tennessee State Library and Archives, 403 Seventh Avenue North, Nashville, TN 37243-0312. (615) 741-2764.

bibl.title: [Entries from the Cherokee Supreme Court Docket, 1823-1834, New Echota] 1825 Oct. 17
bibl.note: This is an excerpt from the Cherokee Supreme Court docket for the years 1823 to 1834. The Cherokee Supreme Court convened annually in New Echota beginning on the second Monday in October and lasting three weeks. This excerpt is from the Monday October 17, 1825 session of court, in which several cases were heard. Entries from this Supreme Court docket cover items ch100-ch163.

projectDesc.p: Created for the University of Tennessee Digital Library

editorialDecl.p: Quotation marks retained as data except inside q tags
Errors in transcription of the printed text controlled with X-Metal 2.1 spell-checker; text has also been thoroughly proofread.
Corrections and normalization represented by editorial tags.
Catchwords and directional notes such as "turn page over" have been omitted.

refsDecl.p: ID attributes provided for only those pages, chapters, or illustrations toward which a reference or figure points.

div.head: Monday 17th
div.p:
Present their Honors John Martin
&C et cetera Jurors George Saunders Foreman, Daniel Griffin,
Thos Thomas Saunders, The Chip, Suttowaka

Johnson Fields
Ptf Plaintiff
vs
Nathan Hicks
Dft Defendant
Judgement in favor of the plaintiff, with costs of 22 cents

Oocoosee Ptf
vs
Crying Wolf Dft
It is the opinion of the Court that the defendant shall keep the contended man George Saunders Fore Foreman

Benjamin Timpson Ptf
vs
Chowanka his old wife Dft
